content: 2 k repeat row 1-2 until heel flap measures 2 1/4 to 2 work rounds 1-2 until 28 32 36 sts remain work 1/2 inches or desired length ending on row 2 decrease round only until 16 20 24 sts remain use kitchener stitch to graft toes turn heel row 1 ws slip 1 p16 18 20 p2tog p1 turn weave in loose ends row 2 slip 1 k7 ssk k1 turn row 3 slip 1 p8 p2tog p1 turn row 4 slip 1 k9 ssk k1 turn continue working one more stitch until all the stitches have been worked you should end on a knit row with 18 20 22 sts remaining do not turn work begin gusset gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each slipped stitch along side of heel pm to indicate start of instep work 30 34 38 sts in pattern as bamboo forest copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may make copies of instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry charts chart c chart a is worked 10 times per round chart b is worked 5 times per round bamboo forest copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may make copies of instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry charts chart a is worked 16 times for small 20 times for large per round chart b is worked 4 times for small 5 times for large per round bamboo forest copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may make copies of instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry written instructions chart a cuff small/large multiple of 4 r1- r3 k2 p2 r4 p repeat row 1-4 for pattern chart a cuff medium multiple of 7 r1- r3 k2 p2 k2 p1 r4 p repeat row 1-4 for pattern chart b multiple of 16 14 16 r1 - r8 k6 p2 1 2 r9 k2 c2 over 2 left p10 8 10 r10 k6 p2 1 2 r11 c2 over 2 right k2 p10 8 10 r12 - r20 k6 p2 1 2 r21 p8 7 8 k2 c2 over 2 left p2 1 2 r22 k6 p2 1 2 r23 p8 7 8 c2 over 2 right k2 p2 1 2 r24 k6 p2 1 2 repeat row 1-24 for pattern bamboo forest copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may make copies of instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry
